text: This is a list of Danish television related events from 1975. ==Events== ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ==Ending this year== ==Births== *7 July - Adam Duvå Hall, comedian & TV & radio host *3 August - Line Kruse, actress *23 September - Lærke Winther Andersen, actress *6 October - Oliver Bjerrehuus, model & TV host ==Deaths== ==See also== *1975 in Denmark
title: 1975 in Danish television
